Learn more

FEATURES

Build your Dapp and earn 45% gas fee reward

Most blockchain networks do not incentivize smart contract developers for their contribution to the network. Dexit Network is designed to incentivize smart contract developers by offering up to 45% gas fees on the protocol level.

Trusted and Secure

You have control over your assets and your transactions are protected by secure blockchain technology.

Cost effective 

Digital assets hold the potential for businesses to undertake cost-effective transactions.

Interoperability 

Increasing interoperability between Dexit and EVM compatible chain; developers will be able to seamlessly migrate.

POSSIBILITIES

What does it mean for your business?

Dexit chain is an ethererum side chain with 100% EVM compatibility, it is designed for decentralized Application (Dapp) development within many possible vertices including DeFi, NFT, Gaming and many others.

Learn More

DeFi Synthetic Asset on Dexit

Using DeFi you can exchange NFTs, buy NFTs, trade tokens, and deposit funds in several other supported chains by using decentralized applications.

No limits

FAQ

Frequently asked questions

Please find the answers to the most frequently asked questions below.

What is Dexit blockchain?

Dexit Chain is to bring  programmability and interoperability to EVM compatible Chain. In order to embrace the existing Tools and Technology DeXit Chain offer several features that existing Chain don’t offer, DeXit Chain will bring huge benefits by staying compatible with all the existing smart contracts on Ethereum, Binance smartchain and several EVM chain, Developer can use all Ethereum tooling on DeXit chain.

Dexit Consensus algorithm??

DeXit uses The Proof-of-Staked-Authority (PoSA) consensus algorithm it is a hybrid between the Proof-of-Staking and Proof-of-Authority consensus mechanism. The PoSA consensus model supports a shorter block time and lower transaction Fees than, for example, the PoW consensus model that Ethereum (ETH) uses. On DeXit chain validators are participants who “stake” a certain number of DXT. When they propose a valid block, they receive transaction fees as a reward for the transactions contained in that block. Validator are determined by ranking according to the Amount of (DXT) self-stake and delegated by delegator. This is determined once a day and the set of all validators is stored separately.

Purpose of DXT?

The DXT Coin has a number of use cases within the Dexit chain. It plays an essential role for a Securing Network.

What is staking reward?

The staking rewards for DXT are variable minimum 14% APY. The rewards on DeXit are dynamic and decrease as the staking participation increases.

What is validator?

Validators are the backbone of the DeXit network. They play critical role on DeXit Network By processing transactions and participating in consensus.

Who can be validator?

Anyone can be validator as long as they have minimum self-stake DXT.

What is Delegator?

Dexit uses Proof of Stake Authority Consensus algorithm so there is validator and Delegator to secure the DeXit Network. Delegator gets incentivize by staking their DXT and vote to potential validator.

Bringing crypto to the world together

The evolution of new technologies, financial innovations and the dramatic evolution of digital currencies is transforming the way we use money.
